thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 263 2
thread.title: Bob

author: Bob
title: Bob
text: I have purchased from other chinese websites like GearBest (pretty good) and Lightake (horrible - they sent me a broken product) but overall I'd have to give the gold medal to Banggood. I have purchased many products from them (mostly remote control quadcopter/drone/airplane toys) and they have supplied very well. Recently I purchased the Eachine VR D2 FPV goggles off of Banggood, the DVR memory card slot was defective, I let them know, and they sent me a new one straight away! Very good customer service. Although - like any store - they can give you a hiccup or two here and there, these guys are overall the best online Chinese site with great prices and free shipping!
